name: Spaghetti Man and the Merging Meatballs
name_original: Spaghetti Man and the Merging Meatballs
description:
"Mama Mia! Spaghetti Man's meatballs escaped, became self-aware, and began self-replicating. Help Spaghetti Man save his restaurant as soon as pasta-ble!" Gameplay

Ovens spawn meatballs that can Merge together to become stronger. Use ingredients around the restaurant to construct weapons to destroy them. There are 8 total ingredients, which are used to make the 5 food weapons.

The goal is to beat the level (destroy all ovens) in the fastest thyme.

Controls

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click

Grapple - Right Click

Switch Food/Find Ingredients - Mouse Wheel

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #14. Unfinished, but olive it ;)
